question:
Consider the following statements about Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana (PMMVY):
  1. It is an initiative under the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
  2. The major objective of the scheme is to provide free antenatal check-ups to pregnant women across the country
  3. The scheme is being implemented using the platform of Anganwadi Services scheme
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u>. Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana (PMMVY) is an initiative under the Ministry of Women and Child Development. <u>Second statement is incorrect.</u> The scheme involves cash-based financial assistance (Rs. 6000) to pregnant women. <u>Third statement is correct</u>. PMMVY is being implemented using the platform of Anganwadi Services scheme. The maternity benefits under Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana (PMMVY) are available to all Pregnant Women & Lactating Mothers (PW&LM) except those in regular employment with the Central Government or State Government or Public Sector Undertaking or those who are in receipt of similar benefits under any law for the time being in force.
